General.Name: Summus Solutions N.V
General.Description: Summus Solutions N.V. engages in the exploration and development of renewable energy and natural gas resources. It also identifies and develops in water, solar, and wind energy businesses. Summus Solutions N.V. was incorporated in 1993 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: Granville Park, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6H 4B9
